summary: A test suite that validates the MobileViTV2 model’s functionality, covering configuration, pretrained loading, forward passes for image classification and semantic segmentation, hidden state outputs, and multi‑GPU parallel execution, while adapting generic tests to the model’s specific input handling.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable performance and correctness of the MobileViTV2 vision model across various deployment scenarios, supporting quality assurance and continuous integration for computer‑vision applications.
